Course Description: COST ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES AND MANAGERIAL ACCOUNTING PRACTICES  CONTINUATION OF ACG 3341.  COVERAGE OF PRODUCT COSTING SYSTEMS, INVENTORY AND QUALITY CONTROL, CAPITAL INVESTMENT, RESOURCE MANAGEMENT, GENERATION AND USE OF ACCOUNTING INFORMATION IN MANAGERIAL BUSINESS DECISION MAKING.  PREREQUISITE: ACG 3341.  3 SEMESTER HOURS CREDIT.
Textbook(s):
1. COST ACCOUNTING,11TH EDITION, HORNGREN, FOSTER, & DATAR OR,
2. COST MANAGEMENT: ACCOUNTING & CONTROL, 5TH EDITION, HANSEN & MOWEN.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
